fundings.title: Kids fake microphone
fundings.fullStory: I have things that I need funded and you should fund it! You're a cool cat that has a lot of money right?

fundings.title: Cardboard washing machine

fundings.fullStory: You read the title correctly. I want that shit. You should fund it

fundings.title: CRT Monitor
fundings.description: Take me back to my glory days of CS 1.6 with this CRT Monitor
fundings.fullStory: I wanna make legit headshots again. Fund this CRT monitor so I can be the best CS1.6 player around.
